name: Handa-lur
description:
Handa-lur, The Traditional Dwarven Board Game of RhithenRhald.

A board game from the world of RithenRhald.

Provided as a program for online play, as well as a PDF of the rules for offline play. The game can be played using just a chessboard and some cards offline.

The server program provided allows for the online play between the games, which need the IP and Port of the game provided when they launch. Port forwarding will need to be set up (6510 unless already occupied) unless you wish to play only over LAN, in which case it will work without much effort.
